inclusion.criterion: COPD patients who require the initiation of a home-NIV (in case of previous equipment: NIV interrupted for more than 6 months)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient who has agreed to participate in the observational study after receiving clear information from the investigator and signing the consent form
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: NIV indicated for the treatment of chronic respiratory failure other than COPD
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patient with overlap syndrome (COPD associated to OSA)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patient with limitations who do not allow proper use of the NIV device
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Simultaneous participation in a health intervention research
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has COPD, requires home-NIV, and has agreed to participate in the study. No clear indication of overlap syndrome or limitations that would prevent proper use of NIV device.
